description: A delicious new summer drink has been invented! It's a pomegranate-grapefruit slush, and it offers you the perfect combo of flavors. You can have it with vodka or wine--or both? This fruity concoction will keep your taste buds satisfied all day long.
name: Pomegranate Grapefruit Frosé
recipeIngredient: ¼ oz. Freshly squeezed lemon juice

recipeInstructions.name: In a blender, add the wine, vodka, grapefruit and lemon juices, and simple syrup. Quickly blend them together.
recipeInstructions.text: In a blender, add the wine, vodka, grapefruit and lemon juices, and simple syrup. Quickly blend them together.

recipeInstructions.name: Add the ice and blend until smooth.
recipeInstructions.text: Add the ice and blend until smooth.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour into a chilled cocktail or margarita glass.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour into a chilled cocktail or margarita glass.
